pullRequest.title: feat: add Azure AD OpenID Connect provider support
pullRequest.bodyText:
Add support for using Azure AD as an OIDC provider
Add support for logout session with OIDC providers that support it
Adjust Authmanager configurations to be explicit for each authentication endpoints
Remove redundant Lombok dependency in the main pom.xml
Small adjustment to comments text

Issue: [DHIS2-9346]

commit.message:
feat: add azure ad oidc provider support

* Adds support for using Azure AD as an OIDC provider
* Add support for logout session with OIDC providers that support it
* Adjust Authmanager configurations to be explict for each authentication endpoint
* Remove redundant lombok dep. in main pom
* Small adjustment to comments text

Signed-off-by: Morten Svanaes <msvanaes@dhis2.org>
